module.name: Core
module.changelog: *13.0.27* PHP setable timezone *13.0.26* Use new custom select in advanced settings *13.0.25* Alert Info dropdown *13.0.24* Support Alert Info dropdown *13.0.23* FREEPBX-11167 *13.0.22* FREEPBX-10450 *13.0.21* FREEPBX-10383 *13.0.20* FREEPBX-11002 *13.0.19* FREEPBX-11082 *13.0.18* FREEPBX-10855 *13.0.17* FREEPBX-11047 *13.0.16* FREEPBX-10965 FREEPBX-10890 FREEPBX-8863 FREEPBX-10909 FREEPBX-10948 FREEPBX-10575 FREEPBX-10797 FREEPBX-10880 *13.0.15* FREEPBX-9951 Japanese language prompts *13.0.14* FREEPBX-10876 SQL escape fix - Eswee Odendaal *13.0.13* FREEPBX-10774 FREEPBX-10752 FREEPBX-10733 FREEPBX-10728 *13.0.12* FREEPBX-10399 *13.0.11* FREEPBX-10569 *13.0.10* FREEPBX-10666, FREEPBX-10691, FREEPBX-10628, FREEPBX-10627 *13.0.9* Speed up inbound routes ten fold. *13.0.8* Clean up some deprecated function calls to reduce noise on large systems *13.0.7* Slide out menus and cosmetic updates *13.0.6* Combine buttons into a single dropdown button *13.0.5* Add the possibility of terminating the call with the no service message *13.0.4* FREEPBX-10496 run needreload when reordering routes *13.0.3* Use floating rnav style listings *13.0.2* First stable release *13.0.1RC1.17* FREEPBX-10528 Move dialpattern npa npx lookup to AJAX handler *13.0.1RC1.16* FREEPBX-10484 Fix extension form validation *13.0.1RC1.15* FREEPBX-10459 Fix macro-dial-one to evaluate blank dialstrings. *13.0.1RC1.14* FREEPBX-10382 Allow dot in usernames on administrators page. *13.0.1RC1.13* FREEPBX-10411 Hide empty categories in advanced settings, FREEPBX-10408 PJSIP Trunk advanced tooltips, other cleanup, FREEPBX-10445 Fix array in routing *13.0.1RC1.12* Fix saving of values *13.0.1RC1.11* FREEPBX-100329 Fix validation for outbound routes *13.0.1RC1.10* FREEPBX-10306 Fix trunk order updating in routing. Add toast to reflect success. FREEPBX-10318 attempt to circumvent browser autocomplete circumvention *13.0.1RC1.9* FREEPBX-8340 Allow PJSip trunks with or without reg/auth *13.0.1RC1.8* Fix invalid js selector and cleanup multiple rows in textarea *13.0.1RC1.7* FREEPBX-10275 Account for bulk pattern box in routing validation. *13.0.1RC1.6* FREEPBX-10227 FREEPBX-10110 Add progress to blackhole destinations that don't answer, FREEPBX-10252 keep atleast one dial pattern row *13.0.1RC1.5* FREEPBX-10227 in outbound routes as well *13.0.1RC1.4* FREEPBX-10227 show mohclass on refresh *13.0.1RC1.3* FREEPBX-10221 Add outbound dialprefix to dialplan manipulation tab *13.0.1RC1.2* FREEPBX-10209 htmlentities need to use UTF-8 *13.0.1RC1.1* fix for the "Unknown or unavailable item requested: 'reversecharge'" warning which some users with non ISDN/PRI trunks have been seeing *13.0.1RC1* Release Candidate 1 *13.0.1beta1.29* FREEPBX-10117 IPv6 updates, reverse charge add false, Add toast to inbound routes for order changes, FREEPBX-10138 fix delete dial rules in routing *13.0.1beta1.28* FREEPBX-10117 Quick Create Extensions not allowing you to dial between extensions *13.0.1beta1.27* FREEPBX-10051 Outbound Route patterns, allow empty if there is a file on import *13.0.1beta1.26* FREEPBX-9939 can not delete outbound route *13.0.1beta1.25* FREEPBX-9913 Timegroup view routing, FREEPBX-9985 Feature SIP Secret generated size, FREEPBX-9931 i18n Audio errors *13.0.1beta1.24* Fix layout issue in Advanced Settings *13.0.1beta1.23* FREEPBX-9886 Bug in trying to disable call waiting and find me follow me grid display fixes *13.0.1beta1.22* FREEPBX-9869 Move IAX secret into main tab *13.0.1beta1.21* FREEPBX-9856 Use the CID if presented *13.0.1beta1.20* Fix faulty bug from core addition *13.0.1beta1.19* FREEPBX-9810 Add post include to most PJSIP files *13.0.1beta1.18* Use new getBinds format *13.0.1beta1.17* FREEPBX-9806 Fix regression from FREEPBX-9753 *13.0.1beta1.16* FREEPBX-9450 fix misspelling on js *13.0.1beta1.15* FREEPBX-9760 wrong dial string *13.0.1beta1.14* FREEPBX-9753 add accountcode for pjsip 12.5.0, FREEPBX-8492 remove duplicated macro outisbusy *13.0.1beta1.13* Revert FREEPBX-8046 to fix FREEPBX-9728 *13.0.1beta1.12* FREEPBX-9717 add correct classes to tabs *13.0.1beta1.11* FREEPBX-9622 Add hook into delUsers and delDevices so other modules can hook into delete processes *13.0.1beta1.10* FREEPBX-9699 unable to save edits to extensions *13.0.1beta1.9* Fix missing buttons in Device and User mode reported in IRC *13.0.1beta1.8* FREEPBX-9685 Dont require email address on quick create, FREEPBX-9684 show apply config after ajax delete *13.0.1beta1.7* Add DID, callerid, and destination to DID bulkhandler validation page *13.0.1beta1.6* Add back missing account field *13.0.1beta1.5* FREEPBX-9509 Cant enable recording external outbound calls from extension *13.0.1beta1.4* FREEPBX-9544 fixes error when changing sip drivers *13.0.1beta1.3* Fix device and user display to accurately reflect correct items *13.0.1beta1.2* FREEPBX-9513 Core:Hangup in inbound routes table leads to 404 error, FREEPBX-9533 error *13.0.1beta1* Bump to beta. Prep for launch *13.0.1alpha35* FREEPBX-9491 List specific destinations in inbound routes chart *13.0.1alpha34* Add Spanish prompts *13.0.1alpha33* FREEPBX-9459 Dialpattern Field Display Issues *13.0.1alpha32* FREEPBX-9461, FREEPBX-8823 Implement a few more features into PJSIP that were missing *13.0.1alpha31* Add tab scrolls to devices *13.0.1alpha30* Fixed: FREEPBX-9446, FREEPBX-9447, FREEPBX-9448, FREEPBX-9449, FREEPBX-9450, FREEPBX-9457 *13.0.1alpha29* When in readonly mode in advanced settings dont just hide the rows, dont even put them in the dom *13.0.1alpha28* FREEPBX-9439 After deleting extension, Quick Create thinks it still exists until reload *13.0.1alpha27* Move features from extension settings into the table *13.0.1alpha26* FREEPBX-9430 If user is empty don't return invalid data *13.0.1alpha25* Fixes: FREEPBX-9419, FREEPBX-9359, FREEPBX-9427, FREEPBX-9426, FREEPBX-9428, FREEPBX-9431 *13.0.1alpha24* FREEPBX-9419 Fixes to looping over invalid arrays *13.0.1alpha23* Looping issue *13.0.1alpha22* Fix advanced settings page display *13.0.1alpha21* FREEPBX-7280 Dynamically generate extensions.conf, FREEPBX-8324 Ensure dialparties calls ALL the pjsip endpoints, FREEPBX-8860 - Add PJSIP Header support to macro-dial and macro-dial-one, FREEPBX-9164 *13.0.1alpha20* Add missing sections back into admin *13.0.1alpha19* Clear cache when deleting things *13.0.1alpha18* Declare the correct namespace name *13.0.1alpha17* Return an array if empty not a null *13.0.1alpha16* Dynamic hints phase 1, core speed up improvements *13.0.1alpha15* add sorting, mass delete and fixes FREEPBX-9193 *13.0.1alpha14* wrap in quotes to prevent an invalid syntax error on transfer if no ringtimer set *13.0.1alpha13* Fix outbound CID issues and address FREEPBX-5894 On outbound calls, phones show outbound Caller ID, even when hidden flag is set *13.0.1alpha12* Fix outstanding bugs with javascript on the trunks page *13.0.1alpha11* FREEPBX-8929, FREEPBX-8930, FREEPBX-8974 Add additional settings to pjsip trunks, reorganize pjsip trunks, fix pjsip trunks so they work *13.0.1alpha10* FREEPBX-8859 Add WSS Support to chan sip *13.0.1alpha9* Dont hard set UTF8 *13.0.1alpha8* FREEPBX-8815 Ordering of allow/disallow in pjsip.endpoint.conf *13.0.1alpha7* FREEPBX-8966 no apply bar after quick create *13.0.1alpha6* FREEPBX-8965 fixed error in creating custom extensions, some virtual extension fixes as well *13.0.1alpha5* Prevent crash during upgrade *13.0.1alpha4* Added load ability for Asterisk Modules *13.0.1alpha3* Hide buttons in grid views on inbound routes and extensions, Adjust sip trunk labels, add confirmation to delete action in trunk grid. *13.0.1alpha2* Reskin. Complete visuals change. Added new functionality. Broke apart drivers.
